name: AAA-21
description: Offical website for the 2021-winter graduation from Aarhus School of Architecture

scripts.bundle-main: esbuild index.main.js --bundle --minify --outfile=../dist/bundle.js --banner='/* Hi! Drop js@dearstudio.dk an email if you want access to the un-minified source (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) */'
scripts.bundle-mobile: esbuild index.mobile.js --bundle --minify --outfile=../dist/bundle.mobile.js --banner='/* Hi! Drop js@dearstudio.dk an email if you want access to the un-minified source (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) */'
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-main && npm run bundle-mobile
scripts.bundle-dev: npm run bundle-main-dev && npm run bundle-mobile-dev

author: JÃ¸rgen Skogmo <js@dearstudio.dk>
